thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 12 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Breitburn Energy Partners Successfully Completes Chapter 11 Reorganization Emerges As Newly Formed Maverick Natural Resources LLC

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Breitburn Energy Partners Successfully Completes Chapter 11 Reorganization Emerges As Newly Formed Maverick Natural Resources LLC
text:
April 12 (Reuters) - Maverick Natural Resources LLC:
* BREITBURN ENERGY PARTNERS SUCCESSFULLY COMPLETES CHAPTER 11 REORGANIZATION: EMERGES AS NEWLY FORMED MAVERICK NATURAL RESOURCES, LLC, CONTROLLED BY FUNDS AND ACCOUNTS MANAGED BY EIG GLOBAL ENERGY PARTNERS
* AS A RESULT OF RESTRUCTURING PROCESS, CO HAS DEBT OF APPROXIMATELY $105 MILLION
* SAYS CO HAS APPROXIMATELY $295 MILLION OF ADDITIONAL BORROWING CAPACITY UNDER A NEW BANK CREDIT FACILITY Source text for Eikon:
